title: Multi-Criteria Evaluation of Suitable Sites for Marine Cage Aquaculture in Southern Iran Based on Oceanographic and Environmental Factors

detail.title: Multi-Criteria Evaluation of Suitable Sites for Marine Cage Aquaculture in Southern Iran Based on Oceanographic and Environmental Factors
detail.abstract: This research assesses the suitability of marine areas in southern Iran for offshore cage aquaculture by considering various environmental and hydrodynamic factors in the Persian Gulf, Strait of Hormuz, and Gulf of Oman. Through the use of fuzzy logic and multi-criteria decision analysis, the habitat suitability for three key species—cobia (Rachycentron canadum, Rachycentridae), barramundi (Lates calcarifer, Latidae), and orange-spotted grouper (Epinephelus coioides, Serranidae)—was evaluated with both equal and expert-derived weighting methods. Results indicate that Rachycentron canadum exhibits adaptability in the challenging conditions of the Persian Gulf, characterized by high salinity and temperature fluctuations. Conversely, Lates calcarifer and Epinephelus coioides show a preference for the more stable environments of the Gulf of Oman and Strait of Hormuz. By incorporating weighted integration techniques, the study achieved greater consistency in results and identified areas with potential for sustainable aquaculture development. The research emphasizes the importance of considering socio-economic and logistical factors, such as market access and infrastructure, in future assessments to enhance operational feasibility. These findings suggest the need for evidence-based spatial planning that prioritizes regions with optimal environmental conditions while also addressing socio-economic aspects for the sustainable growth of Iran’s offshore cage aquaculture industry.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过模糊逻辑和多准则决策分析评估伊朗南部海域网箱养殖适宜性，发现三种鱼类对不同环境条件的适应性差异，强调需结合环境和社会经济因素进行空间规划
AI.research_question: 伊朗南部波斯湾、霍尔木兹海峡和阿曼湾海域哪些区域最适合开展网箱养殖？不同鱼类物种对这些海域环境条件的适应性如何？
AI.motivation: 伊朗海洋水产养殖业发展潜力巨大，但缺乏科学的选址评估方法。需要综合考虑环境、水文和社会经济因素，为可持续的离岸网箱养殖提供决策依据
AI.theoretical_framework: 模糊逻辑理论、多准则决策分析理论、栖息地适宜性评估理论、空间规划理论
AI.method: 采用模糊逻辑和多准则决策分析方法，结合环境和水动力因素，使用等权重和专家权重两种方法评估三种鱼类（军曹鱼、尖吻鲈和橙点石斑鱼）的栖息地适宜性
AI.findings: 1. 军曹鱼能适应波斯湾高盐度和温度波动的挑战性环境；2. 尖吻鲈和橙点石斑鱼偏好阿曼湾和霍尔木兹海峡的更稳定环境；3. 加权整合技术提高了结果一致性，识别出具有可持续养殖潜力的区域
AI.theory_contributions: 发展了基于模糊逻辑和多准则决策的海洋养殖适宜性评估方法框架，为类似研究提供了理论和方法学参考
AI.practical_contributions: 为伊朗离岸网箱养殖业提供了科学的选址指南，识别了最优养殖区域，强调了社会经济和基础设施因素的重要性，支持可持续水产养殖发展

title: Local Decentralization, Location Endowments, and County-Level Economic Development: Evidence from China's County-to-City Reform Policy
affiliations: University of Jinan, University of Jinan, University of Jinan and Queen's University Belfast - Queen's Management School

detail.title: Local Decentralization, Location Endowments, and County-Level Economic Development: Evidence from China's County-to-City Reform Policy
detail.abstract: The relationship between economic decentralization and regional economic growth has attracted wide academic attention. However, existing literature rarely explores the validity and applicability of decentralization theory from the perspective of location endowments. This study takes China’s county-to-city reform - a decentralization policy - as a point of entry to construct a decentralization model incorporating location endowments. Using county-level panel data from 1992 to 2009 and employing a difference-in-differences (DID) approach, the study evaluates the impact of county-to-city reform under the constraint of location endowments on county-level economic development. The findings reveal that the policy effects of local decentralization are constrained by location endowments. Specifically, in regions with poorer location endowments, county-to-city reform significantly inhibits local economic development. Indeed, mechanism analysis further indicates that in such disadvantaged regions, local decentralization under the county-to-city reform generates a “political resource curse” effect, which hinders economic growth through three channels such as distorted fiscal expenditure structures, corruption, and misallocation of land resources. The conclusions of this study provide a valuable perspective for understanding the conditions under which decentralization theory holds, while also offering rigorous empirical evidence for government agencies to design more targeted decentralization policies.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过中国县改市改革分析经济分权与区域经济增长的关系，发现分权政策效果受区位禀赋约束，在区位禀赋较差地区会产生"政治资源诅咒"效应，通过财政支出扭曲、腐败和土地资源配置不当三个渠道抑制经济发展。
AI.research_question: 区位禀赋约束下县改市改革对县级经济发展的影响是什么？
AI.motivation: 现有文献很少从区位禀赋角度探讨分权理论的有效性和适用性，需要构建包含区位禀赋的分权模型来完善理论理解。
AI.theoretical_framework: 经济分权理论、区位禀赋理论、政治资源诅咒理论
AI.method: 使用1992-2009年县级面板数据，采用双重差分法（DID）评估县改市改革在区位禀赋约束下对县级经济发展的影响
AI.findings: 地方分权的政策效果受区位禀赋约束，在区位禀赋较差地区，县改市改革显著抑制当地经济发展，产生"政治资源诅咒"效应
AI.theory_contributions: 为理解分权理论成立的条件提供了有价值的视角，完善了分权理论的适用性边界
AI.practical_contributions: 为政府机构设计更有针对性的分权政策提供了严谨的实证证据

title: Environmental Violation Detection and Green Innovation: Evidence from China
affiliations: KU Leuven, KU Leuven and KU Leuven - Brussels Campus

detail.title: Environmental Violation Detection and Green Innovation: Evidence from China
detail.abstract: This study investigates the impact of China’s 2008 environmental monitoring reform on green innovation in companies. This reform expanded the scope of violation detection by influencing both emissions decisions and strategic detection avoidance behaviors. Employing difference-in-differences methods, we find that the reform significantly induced green innovation, proxied by firms’ green patenting. Moreover, the triple-difference estimators reveal that the reform effect is weaker among state-owned firms, which have fewer detection avoidance behaviors due to their ownership structure and should be less affected by the reform. The reform thus seems to have reduced the informational advantages of avoidance behaviors.

AI.tldr: 中国2008年环境监测改革通过扩大违规检测范围，显著促进了企业绿色创新，但国有企业因规避行为较少而受影响较弱
AI.research_question: 中国2008年环境监测改革如何影响企业绿色创新？
AI.motivation: 研究环境监管改革对企业创新行为的影响，特别是检测范围扩大如何改变企业的排放决策和规避行为
AI.theoretical_framework: 环境监管与创新理论，信息不对称理论，企业所有权结构理论
AI.method: 双重差分法(DID)和三重差分法(DDD)
AI.findings: 改革显著促进了企业绿色创新（以绿色专利申请为代理变量），但国有企业的改革效应较弱
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了环境监管改革通过减少规避行为的信息优势来促进创新的机制
AI.practical_contributions: 为环境政策设计提供了实证依据，表明扩大检测范围可以有效激励企业绿色创新
